title: Rammus
body:
Is there any new game play for rammus. He was one of my fav junglers he wasn't that op or over played but for some reason riot thought they needed to nerf him.
before i could clear at least 5 camps before backing now im lucky if i can clear 3 before i have to back.
Why do they insist in changing champs that not a lot of people play.

replies.body:
He was nerfed because he had an extremely high win rate for like 2 months back in September-October.
They need to look at him again after the Jungle changes though. 

But what you are complaining about is now the norm. Most junglers only get through 3 camps 4 if they are lucky before having to back. Unless you are like Warwick/Xin/Pantheon etc, the jungle really really hurts.

Just so Pissed Off right now just finish a game with rammus was winning the jungle getting  my team kill on ganks. Then I catch Lucian farming by himself bot lane powerball taunt curl exhaust, then he melts me wtf and that was before he was 4 levels higher. 
Should this build on rammus melt adc - http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/92261397/200328505?tab=builds
How broken is rammus now when you have over 270 armor and over 3khp and you can't solo an ad when you taunt him. Even after getting thornmail his autos were doing 1.5k damage and still living.
It was bad enough they nerfed his taunt where you could just get merc treads and it went from 3 sec down to 1 sec.
They had to mess with his armor and damage. WHATS THE POINT OF EVEN HAVEN RAMMUS IN THE CHAMPION ROSTER.
Make his Q damage scale with champion movespeed?

I'm still able to clear 4 camps + scuttle then gank on most jgs I play atm I don't like backing early because you have an advantage if you can get off a gank early for top/mid and allow them to snowball while the enemy jg can't counter because they decided to back
